title: Gallery Program: Look/Write
hero_caption: Brice Marden. Study for the Muses (Eaglesmere Version), 1991–1994/1997–99. Gift of Edlis|Neeson Collection.
short_description: Experiment with a range of creative writing skills and practices using one or two artworks in the collection. Whether you are a novice or a seasoned professional, this experience will deepen your awareness and expand your toolkit for transforming inspired ideas into language. This program is for people ages 16 and up.
description:
Experiment with a range of creative writing skills and practices using one or two artworks in the collection. Whether you are a novice or a seasoned professional, this experience will deepen your awareness and expand your toolkit for transforming inspired ideas into language.

This program is for people ages 16 and up.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
buy_button_caption:
Registration opens on Saturday, August 15, 2019.

$5 members, $10 nonmembers
